title: koTTa sAlava
sahitya:
koTTa sAlava koDade bhaNDATa mADutne


anupallavi

  eSTu bEDidarenna pOyennutAne


caraNam 1    bharadi kELalu jaladi kaNNu bAyi biDutAne turubi kELalu kallu hottaidAne 
urubi kELalu Uru aDaviyoLagirutAne iruLu hagalalli kANisi koLLutAne
    caraNam 2    kaNDu nillisadondu kAlinalli nillutAne koNDa sAlage koDali piDivutAne 
uNDarANeyenlu upavAsavathAne bhaNDatanadali dhakku naDesyADutAne
    caraNam 3    keTTu baiyalu lajje hEvavanu torevutAne koTTu hOgenalu kaliyAgutAne shrSTi-
goDeya shrIranga paTTaNada purandara viTTalEshanu namma pashcimada ranganAtha
